Package org.gwoptics.graphics

Interface Summary
IRenderable Basic interface that defines commonly used functions for any rendered object.
 

Class Summary
GWColour Simple class that encapsulates the 4 colour components alpha, red, green and blue.
Renderable An abstract class that can be inherited to provide some common functionality that all rendered objects have.
